required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Role of CEUS as a Secondary Diagnostic Modality
clinical_study.official_title: Role of Sonazoid-enhanced Ultrasound as a Secondary Diagnostic Modality in Non-invasive Diagnostic Algorithms for Hepatocellular Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the role of contrast-enhanced ultrasound (CEUS) as a second-line imaging modality after gadoxetate-enhanced MRI (Gd-EOB-MRI) for identifying hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) among at-risks observations.

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of our study was to evaluate the diagnostic ability of CEUS with perflubutane to identify HCC on the indeterminate observation in Gd-EOB-MRI and to establish the role of CEUS as a second-line (post-Gd-EOB-MRI) modality for HCC diagnosis.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: All participants underwent CEUS. The image reviews based on cross-section images will be performed with or without CEUS results. Two image sets (cross-sectional image with CEUS and without CEUS) will be compared.

primary_outcome.measure: Compared the image features of CEUS and Gd-EOB-MRI in at-risk observation
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1. For 3 days after undergoing CEUS to check the complication of CEUS, per each participants. 2. The time interval between CEUS and Gd-EOB-MRI should not be exceed 4 weeks.
primary_outcome.description: Compared the frequency of arterial phase hyperenhancement (APHE) and washout in at-risk observation, between CEUS and Gd-EOB-MRI.

primary_outcome.measure: Compared diagnostic performance of Gd-EOB-MRI alone and Gd-EOB-MRI with CEUS.
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1. For 3 days after undergoing CEUS to check the complication of CEUS, per each participants. 2. The time interval between CEUS and Gd-EOB-MRI should not be exceed 4 weeks.
primary_outcome.description: Evaluated sensitivity, specificity and accuracy for diagnose HCC by using Gd-EOB-MRI alone, or Gd-EOB-MRI with CEUS.

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparing image characters between two types of ultrasound contrast media
secondary_outcome.time_frame: For 3 days after undergoing CEUS to check the complication of CEUS, per each participants.
secondary_outcome.description: Comparing image characters between two types of ultrasound contrast media

arm_group.description: Image set which consists of a Cross-sectional image only.
The same participants with Arm1. But image set will consist of a Cross-sectional image and CEUS.

intervention.description: Perflubutane enhanced ultrasound for evaluating hepatic tumor

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- at risk of HCC by Liver Imaging Reporting and Data System (LI-RADS)
- at least one treatment-naïve solid hepatic observation (≥1 cm) while surveillance using US, CT or MRI
- signed informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- congestive hepatopathies
- severe cardiovascular dysfunction
- no recent cross-sectional images within 4 weeks
- suboptimal cross-sectional images quality
